gameDetails.name: Evolution: Promo Pack II
gameDetails.description:
Evolution: Promo Pack II is a collection of promotional items for Evolution and Evolution: Flight that were stretch goals for the 2015 Kickstarter campaign:

     7× Last Stand promo cards, which strike an attacking Carnivore like only a cornered animal can.
     7× Quills promo cards, which incapacitate any Carnivore that attacks the animal.
     7× Pounce promo cards, which allow a Non-Avian Carnivore to surprise its victim, avoiding a nasty defensive trait.
     7× Sharp Teeth promo cards, which enable Carnivores to attack larger creatures, and enables Non-Carnivores to get more food.
     7× Invasive Species promo cards, which allow a Non-Carnivore species to increase population whenever another species is attacked.
     7× Pest promo cards, which allow you to… soil … some of the food at the Watering Hole once you are full.
     7× Rapid Mutation promo cards, which allow some manipulation of traits when they become available.
     1× Food bag depicting a bird.
     1× Gigantic bird first player marker.
